GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14 to before v5.17.4
GSD.description:
gpiolib: acpi: use correct format characters

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.4 by commit 610bb184d4e7b6a91f742ecddcc1169bf6b39b42, it was introduced in version v4.14 by commit e40a3ae1f794a35c4af3746291ed6fedc1fa0f6f. For more details please see the references link.
